casebody.data:
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent
v.
Randy TAFT, Petitioner No. 741 MAL 2017 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. Decided: March 21, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM

AND NOW, this 21st day of March, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, the order of the Superior Court is VACATED, and the matter is REMANDED to that court for further consideration, in light of Commonwealth v. Chmiel, ___ Pa. ___, 173 A.3d 617 (2017).

Justice Mundy did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
